Title: Directs the metropolitan transportation authority to develop and implement an intra-city combination ticket
Summary: Directs the metropolitan transportation authority to develop and implement a lower cost, intra-city combination ticket valid for transfers between the Long Island Rail Road and the Metro-North Commuter Railroad Company both peak and off-peak trains.
LawCode: Add ยง1266-n, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to tickets purchased for the Long Island Rail Road and the Metro-North Commuter Railroad Company
